mapper.update: update rulelist set typeid = #{typeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rulelist = #{rulelist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keyword = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, thresholdvalue = #{thresholdValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value_at_risk = #{value_at_risk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tablename = #{tablename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select rd.id,rd.rtid,rd.userid,rd.authentication_time,sum(value_at_risk) sum,t.type from rulelist_detail rd inner join rulelist_type t on rd.rtid=t.id where rd.userid=#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and rd.authentication_time=#{authentime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by rd.rtid

select type from rulelist_type where type not in(select t.type from rulelist_detail rd inner join rulelist_type t on rd.rtid=t.id where rd.userid=#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and rd.authentication_time=#{authentime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by rd.rtid)

select t.* from (select rd.*,u.username,u.fraction,r.thresholdvalue from rulelist_detail rd,user u ,rulelist r where rid=#{arg0} and rd.userid=u.userid and rd.authentication_time=u.authentication_time and rd.rid=r.id order by rd.authentication_time desc) t group by t.userid
